publicwhip.spmotion: S1M-6 Mr Tom McCabe: That this Parliament agrees -that the office of the Clerk should be open on each of the following days: Monday 24th to Thursday 27th May, Tuesday 1st to Friday 4th June, Monday 7th to Friday 11th June, Monday 14th to Friday 18th June, Monday 21st to Friday 25th June, Monday 28th June to Thursday 1st July; and that the Parliamentary recess should be from Friday 2nd July to Monday 30th August inclusive.

S1M-6 Mr Tom McCabe: That this Parliament agrees that the office of the Clerk should be open on each of the following days: Monday 24 to Thursday 27 May 1999, Tuesday 1 to Friday 4 June 1999, Monday 7 to Friday 11 June 1999, Monday 14 to Friday 18 June 1999, Monday 21 to Friday 25 June 1999, and Monday 28 June to Thursday 1 July 1999; that the Parliamentary recess should be from 2 July 1999 to 30 August 1999 inclusive. (lodged on 18 May, withdrawn on 19 May.) The following amendments have been withdrawn:
